title: NHTSA to investigate Waymo after an AV hit a child near a Santa Monica school
description:
After its autonomous vehicle struck the child, Waymo said she sustained minor injuries, stood up immediately, and walked to the sidewalk.

The post NHTSA to investigate Waymo after an AV hit a child near a Santa Monica school appeared first on The Robot Report.
